          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Shell"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "set a=abcdefgh\necho %a:~0,1%   & rem from index 0, length 1; result: a\necho %a:~1,1%   & rem from index 1, length 1; result: b\necho %a:~0,2%   & rem from index 0, length 2; result: ab\necho %a:~1,2%   & rem from index 1, length 2; result: bc\necho %a:~1%     & rem from index 1 to the end; result: bcdefgh\necho %a:~-1%    & rem from index -1 (last char) to the end; result: h\necho %a:~-2%    & rem from index -2 (next-to-last) to the end; result: gh\necho %a:~0,-2%  & rem from index 0 to index -2, excl.; result: abcdef\necho %a:~0,-1%  & rem from index 0 to index -1, excl.; result: abcdefg\necho %a:~1,-1%  & rem from index 1 to index -1, excl.; result: bcdefg"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },

                "if %a:~0,1%==a echo yes   & rem If variable a starts with \"a\", echo \"yes\".\nif %a:~0,2%==ab echo yes  & rem If variable a starts with \"ab\", echo \"yes\"."

          "properties": {
            "language": [["Shell"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "set a=abcd & echo %a:c=%   & rem replace c with nothing; result: abd\nset a=abcd & echo %a:c=e%  & rem replace c with e; result: abed; \nset a=abcd & echo %a:*c=%  & rem replace all up to c with nothing; result: d\nrem Above, the asterisk (*) only works at the beginning of the sought pattern."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",

          "version": 5

          "properties": {
            "language": [["Shell"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "@echo off\nset myvar=a b;c;d\nset strippedvar=%myvar%\n:repeat\nfor /f \"delims=;\" %%a in (\"%strippedvar%\") do echo %%a\nset prestrippedvar=%strippedvar%\nset strippedvar=%strippedvar:*;=%\nif not \"%prestrippedvar:;=%\"==\"%prestrippedvar%\" goto :repeat"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
